projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
The google play services sometimes crashes on dexer with custom modules and timap, to prevent this, the other modules need to use the same version of google play services that ti.map and add the google play services resource on the project. 

To help our customers is needed to inform what version of google play services is used. This could be on a readme file in the module or inside the docs.
fields.summary: Add the Google play services version used by ti.map module
